title: HTML Layout
body: In an effort to pass along knowledge, I have come across some great tips for creating HTML layouts.  First, you should start by wireframing your design.

title: API Fetches
body: What is your go-to mthod for fetching an API? I personally love Axios and here's why: It supports all HTTP methods!

title: Github Gang
body: I just wanted to write this post to give GitHub its flowers.  I mean serious fellos Devs, what would we do without it?!
